name: Eye Jump - Play With Your Eyes
name_original: Eye Jump - Play With Your Eyes
description:
You are not going to believe your eyes!

Eye Jump is the very first game EVER where you control the game with your EYES!!

• Close both your eyes to launch the ball
• Wink your left eye to move to the left
• Wink your right eye to move to the right

How high will you succeed to go?
